meanings.definition: Planting smaller plants beneath larger ones for added visual interest.
meanings.sent1: The garden looked beautiful with the underplanting of colorful flowers beneath the tall trees.
meanings.sent2: The underplanting of daisies under the rose bushes added a lovely touch to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The underplanting of tiny ferns under the big bushes made it seem like a secret garden.
meanings.sent4: The underplanting of delicate violets under the towering sunflowers created a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The underplanting of bright marigolds under the shady palms was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The act of adding plants beneath existing ones for aesthetic purposes.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the underplanting process of placing new flowers under the old ones in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The underplanting of fresh herbs under the established shrubs enhanced the overall look of the yard.
meanings.sent3: The underplanting of succulents under the cacti gave the garden a quirky vibe.
meanings.sent4: The underplanting of wildflowers under the cultivated roses symbolized harmony in nature.
meanings.sent5: The underplanting of fragrant lavender under the aromatic herbs created a delightful blend of scents.
